text: Iwo amene adatsala m’mbuyo adzati, pamene adzaona inu muli kukonzeka kukatenga katundu amene mwapeza pa nkhondo, “Tiloleni kuti tipite nanu.” Iwo afuna kusintha mawu a Mulungu. Nena, “Ndikosatheka! Inu simudzapita nafe. Mulungu ananena kale za inu.” Ndipo iwo adzati, “Iyayi! Inu muli kutichitira ife nsanje.” “Iyayi! Koma iwo sazindikira koma pang’ono pokha.”
